TopicTitle: The First Million Is What Matters Most - Challenge

Articles.Content:
Show me screenshots showing when you have earned your first million!

Rules:

No cheats, no debug mode, no infinigliders, no bankrupcy exploits, no cancelled contracts.

We'll have 2 categories:

  1. Stock - No mods (with exception of mods that don't affect gameplay, like EVE or DistantObject - no FAR, no MechJeb, or no B9, no Kerbal Engineer Redux or anything alike)
  2. Modded - Free for all (any and every mod is allowed)

Deadline:

27.07.2014 (Sunday) evening.

You have one week to make it happen

I'll make a summary after work on a Monday.

Leaderboard:

[stock]


Will be added on 28.07.2014

[Modded]


Will be added on 28.07.2014

Submission:

Screenshot needs to contain your in-game date along with amount of money you own.


KSP Forum name:
Mods: [COLOR=#696969][FONT=arial]Stock / Yes, or list the mods you used[/FONT][/COLOR]
Date: [COLOR=#696969]Y1 D1 01:00[/COLOR]
Funds: [COLOR=#696969]1 000 000[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#696969] <<IMAGE>>[/COLOR]

Notes: [COLOR=#696969]anything you'd like to add [/COLOR]
